Hi Shailesh,
I'm currently having the exact problem. Take a look at the  
        [junit] Re: How to create data-driven tests? II! 
thread.
I'm still investigating, but I know that I can solve it with bsh (
http://www.beanshell.org ).
Take also a look at http://webmacro.org .
Feel free to contact me.
Good luck,
Reda
